text: Irv Robbins was the brother-in-law of Burt Baskin. He owned Burtâ€™s Ice Cream Shop. He was the owner of Snowbird Ice Cream. The two brothers-in-law merged their companies in 1953 to create Baskin-Robbins. ==Other websites== *Baskin- Robbins website * Category:1917 births Category:2008 deaths
